github_projects.name: Math Misconception Classifier
github_projects.description: A machine learning model to identify misconceptions in math MCQs using embeddings and transformers.

github_projects.name: Virtual Digit Recognizer
github_projects.description: A computer vision project that recognizes hand-drawn digits in real-time using CNN.

github_projects.name: LipSync AI
github_projects.description: A lip-sync generator using transformers to align audio with facial movements.
